version_description: - Update some game gui

- Fix the bug that when using zombie or skeleton then game will crash immediately
- Fix the armor shown issue

- Support 128x64 and 128x128 pixels skins
- Support import skins for cape and rider
- Fix the bug that some skins for mobs cannot be loaded
- Adjust some UI

- Support muting players, reporting players.
- Reported players will be banned by the game.
- Support reporting the rooms.
- Add moderators into the game.
- Fix the bug that some player's head icon isn't updated.

- Improve the map loading performance much
- Fix the bug when importing customized skin
- Add many particle effects. Have foot effect when dashing
- Add new maps
- Fix some other bugs

- Improve the chat function. Players can view the chat history now. Also add a filter to show all messages, system messages or player messages.
- Added snowballs and bows can shoot arrows.
- Adjust the UI layout.
- Fix the duplicate chat bug.
- Fix some other bugs.

- Add function to share your current equipped skin. You can enabled it from: Players list, click the "..." button behind your name, click "Share My Skin" or "Un-Share My Skin". Other players can or can not download your skin now. Only customized skin can be shared. This setting is default false. This setting is cleared when you entering a room.
- Reduce the price of bow, arrow, snowball by 50%
- Adjust the default color of chat to yellow instead of green
- Update the Icon

- Fix the Skin import and export crash on iOS 10.
- Fix the chat bug. Only keeps "All Messages" and "Player Messages" filter.
- Fix the incompatible with iOS 10 issue.

- Added two new maps
- Add chat prefix in the settings
- Add rainbow chat function for VIP
- Can put paintings on wall
- Can add friends, and quick play with he or she
- Fix the filter room bug

- Add pet function! You can have pet in game now.
- Add Christmas functions.
- When player leaving room, his paintings will keep there.
- Cannot directly join a friend's room with password.
- Adjust the UI.

- Add two lobby types: Social and Classic.
- Customize weapons, import or edit.
- Add 4 new maps.
- Fix the bug that in players list cannot show block type.

- Game data are stored in the cloud. The uninstall and reinstall cannot lost the data
- Add 4 new maps
- Add movement clouds
- Add light effect
- Add new skins
- Many new pets
- Other bugs fix

- Every part of "Player" mob can be modified.
- Fix other bugs.

- Bedwars: Support HP upgrades of the base
- Support craft & edit HD skins
- New: Add many tile blocks
- New: Support rail and carts
- New: Room creator can kick other players
- Can change the crafted maps: 1. from one game to another 2. Night mode
- Fix the friend quick join bug
- Fix many other bugs

- Merry Christmas & Happy New Year
- Add workshop, you can upload your maps, skins, weapons, helmets to the workshop
- Add some language support
- Exit game will enter the server instead of lobby
- Fix other bugs

- New game mode: Bed Wars. Stand on the edge block and build on your foot to build bridge
- You can put text on sign block now
- Backup game data when log out
- Can build on foot when you jump
- Add hit back effect
- Add some skins
- Fix other bugs

- Performance optimization, especially memory usage optimization.
- Add new game mode: Maze Runner.
- Add skin editor for "Player" model.
- Bug fix.

- Account System. You can backup your game data in "Account" Panel.
- You can craft 3D items now.
- Add "Night Mode" when you create a new map.
- Enlarge the crafted map size.
- Fix the bug that sometimes cannot find friends.
- Fix other bugs.

- Fix the human skin flip bug
- Fix the murder game mode show murder's name bug
- Rooms panel can show customized maps' icon
- Replace some models and some weapons
- Fix other bugs

- Fix the bug of the camera
- Remove the "More Game" page
- Remote the "Lobby" selection page
- Fix some other bugs

- This is a big update:
- Integrated other mini games developed by FingerLegend.
- Create your home, and invite friends to your home.
- Support opening and closing doors.
- Support many furnitures, you can put them in your home.
- Add modern player model and animations.
- UI improvement.

- Refined "Friends" system.
- Fix the bug that Build Battle will freeze when timeout.
- Fix the bug that sometimes cannot view other players.
- Add "No Start" mode for Hide N Seek game.
- Fix other bugs.

- Integrated 2 new game modes
- Sort homes by modified time
- Increase the damage in Classic mode
- Fix other bugs

- Add new game mode: FPS
- Can create home map with flat ground
- Add "Rare Pets"
- Refined shadows
- Fix other bugs

- Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
- Add "Capture Flag" mode in FPS game
- Add "Legendary" weapons, in 3d view and has animations
- Fix the bug on some device cannot load skins
- Fix the appearance bug in lobby in FPS game
- Adjust the match time in FPS game
- Add "Home Allows Paintings" option when creating game
- 50% off price of furnitures
- Other bug fix

- You can build maps with your friends now. You must set a password for this kind of room.
- You can create maps for some game modes.
- Add Rainbow text now.
- Fix other bugs.

- Fix the bug that the rooms cannot show correctly
- Add "Friends" button in rooms list page. The rooms and friends are auto-refreshed now
- Optimize the memory usage to improve performance
- Fix other bugs

- Performance optimization, especially memory usage optimization.
- Add new game mode: Maze Runner.
- Add skin editor for "Player" model.
- Bug fix.

- Add new game mode: Murder Mystery. This mode also support customized maps.
- Support 3D armors.
- Fix cannot set password when creating game room.
- Fix other bugs.

- Fix the human skin flip bug
- Fix the murder game mode show murder's name bug
- Rooms panel can show customized maps' icon
- Replace some models and some weapons
- Fix other bugs

- Account System. You can backup your game data in "Account" Panel.
- You can craft 3D items now.
- Add "Night Mode" when you create a new map.
- Enlarge the crafted map size.
- Fix the bug that sometimes cannot find friends.
- Fix other bugs.

- New game mode: Bed Wars. Stand on the edge block and build on your foot to build bridge
- You can put text on sign block now
- Backup game data when log out
- Can build on foot when you jump
- Add hit back effect
- Add some skins
- Fix other bugs

- NEW: Emotions
- NEW: Craft Helmets
- NEW: Change "No Start" mode to "Role Play" mode
- FIX: In "Murder Mystery" mode, the detective will lost his weapon when he killing innocents
- FIX: In "Bed War" mode, the later players can see previous blocks
- Fix many other bugs

- Bedwars: Support HP upgrades of the base
- Support craft & edit HD skins
- New: Add many tile blocks
- New: Support rail and carts
- New: Room creator can kick other players
- Can change the crafted maps: 1. from one game to another 2. Night mode
- Fix the friend quick join bug
- Fix many other bugs

- Merry Christmas & Happy New Year
- Add workshop, you can upload your maps, skins, weapons, helmets to the workshop
- Add some language support
- Exit game will enter the server instead of lobby
- Fix other bugs

- Great graphics improvement on crafted items (Better shadow and remove "white" lines)
- Add crafted furnitures. Max dimension is: 4x4x4 blocks. Can share it to workshop
- Touch the screen to build or destroy blocks
- Add Joystick movement
- Purchased items don't need to bug again
- Crafted weapons has a flag for "Gun-like". Set it to attack as guns
- Fix bug sometimes cannot log out
- Fix bug when crafting map with friends online (Show owner disconnected when connected)
- Fix many other bugs

- Bring back touchpad control type
- Correct collider and eye height with scales
- Fix rooms list bug
- Fix other bugs

- Fix the import skins bug
- Correct the shadow in different positions. (In the dark environment, player will be bright when close to the light)
- Fix other bugs

- Update the spawn position when out of the map.
- Bring back the old "Build" button. You can set it in the Settings panel.
- Fix other bugs.

- Add crafted Capes
- Add "Mirror" option when crafting items
- Optimize the network to reduce connection issue
- Ignore scales in Bedwars
- Cannot kick players during the game
- Fix the bug player's dead status was not refreshed
- Fix other bugs

- Support search and add friend by HNS ID. Your HNS ID is in your information panel.
- Support leave chat message to friends.
- Can view friends' status and last logout time.
- Fix other bugs.

- You can craft models (2 legs, and 4 legs)
- Support popup emojis
- Support fireworks
- Bugs fix

- Fix the ad bug
- Fix other bugs

- Add new game mode: snowball fight
- Fix inappropriate game name and game icon. If you map's icon is blank, please reopen the map and exit to re-generate the icon.
- Performance improvement
- Fix many bugs

- Add new game mode: battle royal
- Set snowball color in snowball fight mode
- Change animations
- Fix many other bugs

- Add Christmas theme, holiday activities
- Add Day-Night Cycle
- Fix room names issue
- Speed up the pace of the battle game.
- Fix bugs

- New electric blocks
- Players will be killed by laser & lava. Even in the waiting room
- Add several maps for bed wars
- Add chair blocks, you can sit in it
- Support password for doors
- Remove old format furnitures
- Fix many other bugs
